main event: A bright silver object was observed by multiple witnesses near Sampson AFB in Geneva, New York on October 9, 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as bright silver and circular in shape, 1 witness said it appeared to be much larger than a jet aircraft, A loud roaring noise was reported accompanying the sighting, The first witness observed the object for about one minute before it disappeared from view, There were no photos included with the report despite several observations.
sighted object: a bright silver object resembling a disc
witness description: One witness was a Captain in the U.S. Air Force and another was a young girl.
